headerDisplay: Plugin for the Smart Recirculation Control 32 by Leridian Dynamics, Inc.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the accessory in HomeKit. For example, "Hot Water Recirculation" is On or Off

deviceUid.title: Unique ID
deviceUid.description: A unique ID assigned to this device.

controllerName.title: Controller Name
controllerName.description: The name of the controller as it appears in the "Smart Recirc 32" app.

serverConfig.title: Server Configuration
serverConfig.description: This is the configuration to use when listening to requests from the controller. This must match "Webhook Outbound" under Advanced Settings in the "Smart Recirc 32 app".
